name: Leslie Legging : Ash Black
description:
One word describes the Leslie legging and that word is BAD-ASS, the Leslie legging a must have for any chick with some danger in her. Leather knee patches, soft cotton blend fabric makes this legging the star of any outfit you match it with.

~~~~~Colors~~~~~~
*Ash Black: Shown in picture above
Ash Grey

~~~~~~Martial/Care~~~~~~
90% Organic Cotton 10%Spandex 
Knee Patches: 100% Cow Leather Or Faux Leather
Dry Clean Suggested, Hand wash cold, Lay Flat to Dry
Hand Dyed

~~~~~Sizes~~~~~~
Sizes: XS(0-2), S(4-6), M(8-10), L(12) : All Inseams are 35

*******Please Note**********
Each piece has it's own unique look as the dye process is all done by hand. I do my best to keep it as close to what is shown in the above pictures. 
******Update******
I've updated the knee on these leggings. Please see the last picture for updated new look. 

I can also make this piece using faux leather. Just send me a message while you place your order. The price while not change. 


Lovingly made in Seattle, WA

name: Eco Friendly Large Double Leather Wing Earrings
description:
These Double Large Wing Earrings are made from scrap leather with gold or sliver leaf detail. They have gunmetal findings which are made from mix metals. 

Measurements the bottom layer:
Length: 6 1/2" 
Width: 1 1/2"

**Just send me a message if you need these with nickel free findings. **
*** Please note: The leather will curl and give them more of a feather look to the earrings. The gold will dull a bit as it is gold leaf***

name: Eco Friendly Double Fringe Leather Earrings
description:
These Double Golden Fringe Earrings are a great piece to add to your wardrobe. They are made from soft leather with painted golden or sliver tips for that added design element. 

ª Scrap Leather
ª Gold Leaf or Sliver Leaf
ª Mix Metal Ear finding.
ª Measurements:
Length: 6 1/2" Longest layer
Width: 1 1/4"
ª Eco Friendly

Made with love in Seattle


**Just send me a message if you need these with nickel free findings. **
